NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 CASSAVA: What.. what has transpired? Why has everyone fallen? And this mysterious matter permeates everywhere I look through the projection pool... 2 1 CASSAVA: No.. No.. This can't be... 3 2 CASSAVA: Daz... My friends.. My clan.. How? What could have caused this..? 4 2 CASSAVA: Was I the only one untouched by whatever calamity has befallen my clan? Why have I alone been spared? 5 4 CASSAVA: Am I now trapped here without escape? I.. I have little chance of staving off thirst and hunger for long.. 6 5 CASSAVA: Wait.. Daz's voyager stones! I can voyage and traverse outside of the station safely using the voyager stones! 7 6 CASSAVA: I.. I must seek out and understand what has happened - as well as search for any other survivors... DSS EX1 1 DSS EX2 1 DSS EX3 4
